Plot: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.
Title: Superhero Movie
Actors: Drake Bell, Sara Paxton, Christopher McDonald, Leslie Nielsen
tomatoConsensus: Superhero Movie is not the worst of the spoof genre, but relies on tired gags and lame pop culture references all the same.
